org.springframework.cloud.stream.aggregate

Class AggregateApplicationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.stream.aggregate.AggregateApplicationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.SmartInitializingSingleton, AggregateApplication, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @EnableBinding
public class AggregateApplicationBuilder
extends Object
implements AggregateApplication, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.SmartInitializingSingleton
    Application builder for AggregateApplication.
    Author:
    Dave Syer, Ilayaperumal Gopinathan, Marius Bogoevici, Venil Noronha, Janne Valkealahti, Vinicius Carvalho, Oleg Zhurakousky
